title: following provisions of the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 

(Commencement of Certain Provisions) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited maritime area planning act 2021 (commencement certain provisions) order 2022

title: following provisions of the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021)
heading: 2. The 10th day of March 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 10th day of March 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 

following provisions of the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021) 
shall come into operation: 
section 72; 

(a) 
(b) Part 4 (other than Chapter 12); and 
(c) Part 6. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 March, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th March, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [112] 3
